column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Opal says : " Are you sure you felt a disturbance ?
#Text=Maybe something happened to Ryu 's tour group .
#Text=We should 've run into them by now .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , but it 's Ryu .
#Text=They might be at the mall , for all we know .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Korra , ca n't you feel how strange the energy is ?
#Text=" Korra says : " No ... but maybe I can get a reading .
#Text=" Opal says : " Korra , what is it ?
#Text=Are you okay ?
#Text=" Korra says : " It was Kuvira .
#Text=I saw her taking vines from the swamp .
#Text=It must be affecting our Spirit Wilds .
#Text=I bet that 's what you were sensing , Jinora .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Why is she taking vines ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Whatever the reason , I 'm sure it 's not good .
#Text=" Opal says : " We have to tell Raiko .
#Text=This might help him convince the other leaders to finally take her down !
#Text=" Jinora says : " I 'll keep looking for Ryu and the others .
#Text=" Raiko says : " I say we deal with this Kuvira situation immediately .
#Text=" Wu says : " Yes !
#Text=Agreed !
#Text=And I know just how to get rid of her : we tell her she won an all - expense paid vacation to a tropical island .
#Text=Then , when she gets there , we reveal that it was a trap .
#Text=The island 's a prison !
#Text=Boom !
#Text=Got her !
#Text=Or , okay , uh , I 'm just spitballing here .
#Text=We march in with an army of highly trained badgermoles !
#Text=Do we know if Kuvira has any allergies ?
#Text=" Raiko says : " Look , I think we all know what must be done .
#Text=We take the fight to her .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I do n't believe attacking is the right move , since she has n't done anything aggressive toward the United Republic .
#Text=" Lin says : " Not yet .
#Text=But Kuvira ca n't be trusted .
#Text=She told us that she was going to turn over power and she did n't .
#Text=I 'm with Raiko .
#Text=I say we go on the offensive and start by retaking Zaofu .
#Text=" Korra says : " President Raiko , I 'm sorry to interrupt , but ... What 's going on here ?
#Text=" Wu says : " Oh , hey , Avatar Korra .
#Text=Just kickin ' it world leader - style , trying to figure out what to do about Kuvira .
#Text=For the record , I told Raiko he should 've invited you .
#Text="
